subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4124, how did it go?
description_text: Hi. Still waiting in the missing bits. On 6 Jan 2026 13:51, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote: Hello Tammy, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello Tammy, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback Pro X Ultra-P3-H3 / Baseplate Dislike it Love it! Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Can someone please get in touch with me about returning this. I have been trying to get the missing parts from yourselves so that we can set these peddles up. It was meant to be a Xmas present for my son. It was ordered 41 days ago and still we are waiting. I am very disappointed with the service and would like someone to contact me. Thank you.

Hi tammy williams,    I apologize for not replying to you promptly. Here is your shipping tracking link. I see it has been delivered. Have you received it? I'm very sorry for the inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047219403189

I received the package but it clearly states that we need 6 of the 20mm screws and bolts but there was only 1 in the package so am no better off. I tried to buy them from shops but they don't seem to be stocked anywhere. I am very disappointed with the service from this company. I paid  a lot of money for a product that has sat in a box for the last 6 weeks because your company keep making mistakes. My son feels like he's not had a proper xmas present because of this. The instructions clearly state 6 screws
Are required but someone only sends 1?  Seriously? Please sort this. Thank you


Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------
Hi tammy williams,    This is the installation manual for the new bracket.
